plot: Spike and Jet take on Maria Murdock, the leader an extreme animal rights activist group called the Space Warriors. Faye stumbles her way back onto the Bebop and may help them out.

Faye is stranded on the orbit of Jupiter with no fuel or money. Unable to travel, she impatiently waits for someone to arrive near her route. Eventually, she finds a ship drifting by only to see it damaged with a dying pilot. The pilot gives her a briefcase and tells her to go to the I.S.S.P with it. Meanwhile, Jet and Spike track down a bounty head named Morgan at a restaurant, who heads an Eco-terrorist association. Their paths converge and the three meet again as the episode progresses.—Anonymous
